summary: JUNE 19, 2016 - MOTORCYCLE IN MOTION ON A CURVE ON THE HIGHWAY AND ENGINE ACCELERATED WITHOUT THROTTLE INPUT (THROTTLE STUCK) WHILE IN A TURN AND ATTEMPTING TO SLOW DOWN.    JUNE 25, 2016 - MOTORCYCLE IN MOTION ATTEMPTING TO COME TO A STOP ON A CITY STREET WHEN THE ENGINE ACCELERATED WITHOUT THROTTLE INPUT (THROTTLE STUCK.)  AUGUST 19, 2016 - MOTORCYCLE IN MOTION ON FREEWAY FOR APPROX. 30 MILES.  WHEN EXITING AT OFF-RAMP ATTEMPTING TO STOP, ENGINE ACCELERATED WITHOUT THROTTLE INPUT (THROTTLE STUCK).    REPORTING THIS PROBLEM FOR DOCUMENTATION/POSSIBLE RECALL PURPOSES, AS I WAS GIVEN ANOTHER MOTORCYCLE AS A COLLATERAL EXCHANGE ONCE A COMPLAINT WAS FILED WITH HARLEY HEADQUARTERS.    OFFICIAL COMPLAINT NUMBER FILED WITH HARLEY-DAVIDSON WAS 2849861 FILED 9/7/16.  HARLEY DAVIDSON SOLD THIS MOTORCYCLE TO ANOTHER PERSON, AS I'VE SEEN IT IN TOWN.
